price: 36. Mais Nous n’y trouvâmes qu’une seule maison de (croyants) Soumis.
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
